name: Detailed Cash Report By User
query:
select 
    s.name as `SR:Data:150`,
    "Invoice" as `Type:Data:100`,
    s.posting_date as `Date:Date:100`,
    s.customer_name as `Customer:Data:200`,
    m.account as `Account:Link/Account:200`,
    m.amount as 'Amount:Currency:150'
from 
    `tabSales Invoice` s 
left join 
    `tabSales Invoice Payment` m on s.name = m.parent
left join 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` i on s.name = i.parent
where 
    s.docstatus = 1 
    and s.posting_date between %(from)s and %(to)s 
    and s.owner = %(user)s
    and s.paid_amount>0

UNION ALL

select 
    p.name, 
    "Receipt" as `Type:Data:100`, 
    p.posting_date, 
    p.party_name, 
    p.paid_to, 
    p.paid_amount 
from 
    `tabPayment Entry` p 
where 
    p.docstatus = 1 
    and p.owner = %(user)s 
    and p.posting_date between %(from)s and %(to)s
    AND p.payment_type= "Receive"

UNION ALL

select 
    e.name, 
    "Expenses" as `Type:Data:100`, 
    e.date, 
    e.remark as jj, 
    e.paid_from, 
    -1 * e.amount
from 
    `tabExpenses` e 
where 
    e.docstatus = 1 
    and e.owner = %(user)s 
    and e.date between %(from)s and %(to)s

UNION ALL

select 
    e.name, 
    "Transfred from" as `Type:Data:100`, 
    e.date, 
    e.remark as jj, 
    e.from_account, 
    -1 * e.transferred_amount
from 
    `tabInternal Transfer` e 
where 
    e.docstatus = 1 
    and e.from_user = %(user)s 
    and e.date between %(from)s and %(to)s
UNION ALL

select 
    e.name, 
    "Transfred To" as `Type:Data:100`, 
    e.date, 
    e.remark as jj, 
    e.to_account, 
    e.transferred_amount
from 
    `tabInternal Transfer` e 
where 
    e.docstatus = 1 
    and e.to_user = %(user)s 
    and e.date between %(from)s and %(to)s;
